title: Market share of the global luggage market 2015 , by company
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Company, and a y axis representing Market share.
The highest category is found at Samsonite_International_SA where Market share is 17.3.
The lowest category is found at Shanghai_Taifeng_Cases_Co_Ltd where Market share is 0.6.

data.Company: LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA

gold: The statistic shows the market share of the global luggage market in 2015 , by company . In that year , the global market share of Samsonite was approximately 17.3 percent .
